action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of a series of colored blocks arranged in a pattern. The blocks are in shades of green, purple, and orange, forming a larger shape that resembles a combination of letters and symbols.
continue

Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains a series of colored shapes arranged in a specific pattern. There are two red "T" shapes, one yellow "T" shape, one yellow cross shape, and one purple "U" shape. The shapes are placed in a vertical line with the "T" shapes at the top and bottom, the cross shape in the middle, and the "U" shape in the middle of the "T" shapes.
